price: Sema: Tarajieni, na mimi pia ni pamoja nanyi katika kutarajia.
arabic: قُلۡ تَرَبَّصُواْ فَإِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
footnotes: Waambie kwa kuwatisha: Ngojeeni, na mimi nami ni katika wanao ngojea mwisho wa hali yangu na hali yenu!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul tarabbaṣū fa-innī maʿakum mina al-mutarabiṣīna
